service.name: core-debugger
service.description: Monitors and debugs Vrooli core infrastructure (CLI, orchestrator, resource manager, setup scripts) with file-based issue tracking and workaround database

ui.description: Core debugger status page UI port

claude-code.purpose: Intelligent issue analysis and fix generation
claude-code.description: Analyzes core issues and suggests fixes

setup.description: Initialize Core Debugger with file-based storage

steps.name: create-data-structure
steps.run: mkdir -p data/{issues,health,workarounds,patterns,logs}

steps.name: initialize-component-registry
create-issue-templates
steps.run:
mkdir -p data/templates && cat > data/templates/issue-template.json << 'EOF'
{
  "id": "",
  "component": "",
  "severity": "medium",
  "status": "active",
  "description": "",
  "error_signature": "",
  "first_seen": "",
  "last_seen": "",
  "occurrence_count": 1,
  "workarounds": [],
  "fix_attempts": [],
  "metadata": {}
}
EOF

steps.name: install-cli
steps.run: chmod +x cli/core-debugger && ln -sf $(pwd)/cli/core-debugger ~/.local/bin/core-debugger 2>/dev/null || echo '  CLI available at ./cli/core-debugger'

steps.name: build-api
steps.run: cd api && go mod download && go build -o core-debugger-api .

steps.name: initialize-health-baseline
steps.run: echo '{}' > data/health/baseline.json

steps.name: show-urls
steps.run:
echo 'ğŸ” Core Debugger initialized
  ğŸ“Š Status Page: http://localhost:${UI_PORT}
  ğŸ“¡ API: http://localhost:${API_PORT}
  ğŸ¯ CLI: core-debugger --help
  ğŸ“‚ Data: ./data/

ğŸ’¡ Check core health:
  core-debugger check-health
  core-debugger list-issues
  core-debugger status --verbose'

steps.name: start-api
steps.run: cd api && ./core-debugger-api

steps.name: start-ui
steps.run: cd ui && python3 -m http.server $UI_PORT > /dev/null 2>&1

steps.name: start-health-monitor
steps.run: bash scripts/health-monitor.sh &

steps.name: wait-for-api
steps.run: ../../scripts/lib/utils/wait-for-service.sh http://localhost:$API_PORT/health 15 2
steps.description: Wait for API server to be ready

steps.name: initial-health-check
steps.run: sleep 1 && ./cli/core-debugger check-health || true
steps.description: Run initial health check on all components

steps.name: show-running-services
steps.run:
echo 'ğŸ” Core Debugger running:
  ğŸ“Š Status Page: http://localhost:$UI_PORT
  ğŸ“¡ API: http://localhost:$API_PORT/health
  ğŸ¯ CLI: core-debugger --help

ğŸ”¬ Monitor core components:
  core-debugger status
  core-debugger check-health --component cli
  core-debugger list-issues --severity critical

ğŸ“ Report issues:
  core-debugger report-issue --component orchestrator --description "Error details"
  core-debugger analyze-issue <issue-id>'

steps.name: test-data-structure
steps.run: test -d data/issues && test -d data/health && test -d data/workarounds && echo 'âœ“ Data structure exists' || (echo 'âœ— Data structure missing' && exit 1)

steps.name: test-component-registry
steps.run: test -f data/components.json && jq '.components | length' data/components.json > /dev/null && echo 'âœ“ Component registry valid' || (echo 'âœ— Component registry invalid' && exit 1)

steps.name: test-cli
steps.run: bash cli/core-debugger --help | grep -q 'Core Debugger' && echo 'âœ“ CLI working' || echo 'âš  CLI test failed'

steps.name: test-go-build
steps.run: cd api && go build -o test-build . && rm test-build && echo 'âœ“ Go compilation successful' || echo 'âš  Go compilation failed'

steps.name: test-api-health
steps.run: curl -sf http://localhost:$API_PORT/health && echo 'âœ“ API healthy' || echo 'âš  API not running (expected if not started)'

steps.name: test-health-checks
steps.run: ./cli/core-debugger check-health --json > /tmp/health.json && test -s /tmp/health.json && echo 'âœ“ Health checks working' || echo 'âš  Health checks not available'

steps.name: stop-api
steps.run: pkill -f 'core-debugger-api' || true

steps.name: stop-ui
steps.run: pkill -f 'python3.*http.server.*$UI_PORT' || true

steps.name: stop-monitor
steps.run: pkill -f 'health-monitor.sh' || true

steps.name: save-final-state
steps.run: if [ -f api/core-debugger-api ]; then ./cli/core-debugger check-health --json > data/health/last-state-$(date +%Y%m%d-%H%M%S).json || true; fi

steps.name: confirm-stop
steps.run: echo 'ğŸ›‘ Core Debugger services stopped\nğŸ“ Data preserved at: ./data/'

steps.name: archive-old-issues
steps.run: mkdir -p data/archive && find data/issues -name '*.json' -mtime +30 -exec mv {} data/archive/ \;

steps.name: compress-logs
steps.run: find data/logs -name '*.log' -mtime +7 -exec gzip {} \;

steps.name: cleanup-summary
steps.run: echo 'Cleanup complete. Archived $(find data/archive -name "*.json" | wc -l) old issues.'
